titles.title: Parental Responsibility Act
To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to ensure the identification of the biological parents of each child who receives aid to families with dependent children.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H600)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H3788-3789)

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Parental Responsibility Act - Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to reduce the payments to States for AFDC benefits on a graduated basis according to the State's rate of failure in identifying the biological parents of children on AFDC.
